name: electrothermal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or combining both electricity and heat, especially the production of heat from electricity: Lower back pain may be treated with electrothermal therapy. The food samples were dried in an electrothermal drying box.
More examplesFewer examplesThis treatment for back pain applies high heat directly to the inside of the disc.Electrothermal therapy delivers targeted thermal energy to the problem area.Although electrothermal injuries from surgery are rare, they can be devastating.Electrothermal methods could allow patients with early stage arthritis to be treated easily.
